channel.title: Mexican on Table41NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Mexican on Table41NYC

item.title: Casa Enrique
item.description: Michelin 1 star restaurant for Mexican. Place isn’t great, but it’s not bad. Tacos are WAY too pricey at $6 a piece for such a tiny thing.

item.title: Waheyo
item.description: Interesting Chipotle/Dos Toros style but feels a little more ghetto? Food was ok but cheap.

item.title: Tacombi
item.description: Pretty decent tacos albeit a little expensive. Al Pastor was probably my favorite. Guac was ok too. They have several locations now.

item.title: Lucky Luna
item.description: Got the pozole here which seems to be uncommon here in NYC. Spicy, but pretty good. Too bad it’s CLOSED.

item.title: Los Tacos
item.description: Pretty good for NYC. Still cannot compare to LA.
